Kracken aimed at Ice.

Kracken: Yo! That one will be good!

Kracken fires 2=
 missiles at Ice. Gigas fires his wave beams at Ice. Horn Drill fires at Ic=
e, Grenade and Beholder 2 join their blasted together into one, both of the=
m holding the large gun, and fire it at Ice...
  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, December =
15, 2000 5:16 AM
  Subject: Re: Cross Fire


  Razor Claws knocked back aft=
er being caugh off gaurd by the first missle. He hits the ground leaving a =
skid mark across the ground, He roared with pain as shrapnel from other mis=
sles hit around him. He rolled back to his feat creating his forcefield. As=
 long as his feat remained planted the shots wouldn't be able to penetrate.=
 "Ice, Lunarpine, I've got them distracted, any time you'd like to join the=
 fun, I'm ready to Party." He shouts over his comm. He knew that his teamat=
es had thier paws full no matter where they were.
    ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday,=
 December 14, 2000 9:39 AM
    Subject: Re: Cross Fire


    The Mini-Mafia=
 split back up again. Kracken sees Razorclaw.

    Kracken: I won't ask. He=
y! Look! Razorclaw! Good target, mob! Start with one, don't target another =
till he's done!

    Kracken fires 2 missiles at Razorclaw. Horn Dril fires=
 a drill missile, with the power of about 2 missiles because it's packed wi=
th acidic material and explosives and just waiting to explode, and he fired=
 this single missile at Razorclaw. Gigas fires a bolt of electricity from h=
is hand at Razorclaw. Grenade shoots a fireball at Razorclaw. Beholder 2 fi=
res 3 beams, they travel in waves toward Razorclaw...
      ----- Original =
Message ----- 
      From: Alloran2@... 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
      Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2000 8:54 AM
      Subject: Re: Cross Fi=
re


      OOC: No, 2 missles out of one missle luancher.  If you have two,=
 than you can 
      2 from each of them.  Oh, sorry, didnt know what EMPs =
did. I'll take that 
      back. 

      :::Sharpedge/Godfather/Hellbat/Sha=
rpedge/Treadshot/Torca/Starscream::: 

      ::He dodges the missles but ge=
ts hit by a charge andthe optic blasts.  he 
      fires 2 missles at Hot R=
od.  Godfather uses his jetpack to go over all the 
      shots.  Staying i=
n the air, he fired 15 shots from his pistol at Teltoli.  
      Hellbat ge=
ts knocked out from the EMP.  Hearing what FZ said, Sharpedge opens 
      =
up a comm to the Mafia:: 
      Sharpedge: Mafia, do not for Mobster yet.  =
We must wait until they are 
      weakened! Zardus' orders. 
      ::Tread=
shot transforms to tank mode and lobbed 2 missles at Razor Claw. Torca 
   =
   hears Klant's words:: 
      Torca: Thats alright, well wait here till y=
ou ARE ready. 
      ------------------------------------------------------=
------------------------

      ::Starscream maneuvers out of the way of the fire ball, firing 25=
 shots from 
      each of his 2 guns at Megaton::

sor
